properties.Description: The properties of a build step.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the build step.

imageNames.Description: The fully qualified image names including the repository and tag.

isPushEnabled.Description: The value of this property indicates whether the image built should be pushed to the registry or not.

noCache.Description: The value of this property indicates whether the image cache is enabled or not.

dockerFilePath.Description: The Docker file path relative to the source control root.

contextPath.Description: The relative context path for a docker build in the source.

buildArguments.Description: The custom arguments for building this build step.

baseImageDependencies.Description: List of base image dependencies for a step.

baseImageTrigger.Description: The type of the auto trigger for base image dependency updates.

isSecret.Description: Flag to indicate whether the argument represents a secret and want to be removed from build logs.

type.Description: The type of the base image dependency.

digest.Description: The sha256-based digest of the image manifest.

properties.Description: The properties of a build task.

location.Description: The location of the resource. This cannot be changed after the resource is created.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of the build task.

creationDate.Description: The creation date of build task.

alias.Description: The alternative updatable name for a build task.

status.Description: The current status of build task.

sourceRepository.Description: The properties that describes the source(code) for the build task.

platform.Description: The platform properties against which the build has to happen.

sourceControlType.Description: The type of source control service.

repositoryUrl.Description: The full URL to the source code repository

isCommitTriggerEnabled.Description: The value of this property indicates whether the source control commit trigger is enabled or not.

sourceControlAuthProperties.Description: The authorization properties for accessing the source code repository.

token.Description: The access token used to access the source control provider.

refreshToken.Description: The refresh token used to refresh the access token.

scope.Description: The scope of the access token.

expiresIn.Description: Time in seconds that the token remains valid

osType.Description: The operating system type required for the build.

cpu.Description: The CPU configuration in terms of number of cores required for the build.

buildId.Description: The unique identifier for the build.

status.Description: The current status of the build.

lastUpdatedTime.Description: The last updated time for the build.

createTime.Description: The time the build was created.

outputImages.Description: The list of all images that were generated from the build.

buildTask.Description: The build task with which the build was started.

imageUpdateTrigger.Description: The image update trigger that caused the build.

gitCommitTrigger.Description: The git commit trigger that caused the build.

isArchiveEnabled.Description: The value that indicates whether archiving is enabled or not.

platform.Description: The platform properties against which the build will happen.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state of a build.

digest.Description: The sha256-based digest of the image manifest.

id.Description: The unique ID of the trigger.

timestamp.Description: The timestamp when the image update happened.

images.Description: The list of image updates that caused the build.

id.Description: The unique ID of the trigger.

commitId.Description: The unique ID that identifies a commit.

branchName.Description: The branch name in the repository.

nextLink.Description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.
